name: Devilish Mockery
description:
Well hello there, little demon.

You are mad because in hell no one takes you seriously? How about bringing hell to earth? Show the other demons what you're made of by taking over humanoid bodies and bringing them to end each others lives.

This should impress your mates in hell and if it doesn't stay on earth - until there is no one left.

This is a submission to the Franken Game Jam 2022.

Credits
Code: Nico, Sascha, Bobo
Art: Tina, Kon
Narration: Marie

Not suitable for minors.
